sentences.english: The mayor is so popular that he has the whole town under his thumb.
sentences.chinese: 市長如此深得人心，全城人都聽他的。

sentences.english: The whole city was immersed in a festival atmosphere.
sentences.chinese: 全城沉浸在節日氣氛之中。

sentences.english: Recently restaurants sell soups and drinks made from concentrate has brought into focus.
sentences.chinese: 近來，全城熱議餐廳使用濃縮液製作湯及飲料。

sentences.english: Cunninghamia lanceolata let turtle Tian Dazuo give the city the Japanese off for three days.
sentences.chinese: 杉木讓龜田大佐給全城的日軍放假三天。

sentences.english: You may have a bird-eye view of the whole city there.
sentences.chinese: 那兒您可以鳥瞰全城的景色。

sentences.english: News of the Queen's visit set the whole town astir .
sentences.chinese: 女王到訪的消息轟動全城。

sentences.english: It has become the laughingstock of the town.
The next morning Archer scoured the town in vain for yellow roses.
sentences.chinese: 第二天早上，阿切爾找遍了全城也沒找到黃攻瑰。

sentences.english: By the time we pulled up to Hotel Borghetti in Valpolicella, it was already 9 pm.
sentences.chinese: 等我們到達酒店時，已經9點多了，全城飯館都關了。

sentences.english: Sydney is afire with Olympic enthusiasm.
sentences.chinese: 悉尼全城燃燒着奧林匹克的熱情。

sentences.english: The whole city turned out to cheer the Pope .
sentences.chinese: 全城居民傾巢而出歡迎教皇。

sentences.english: The earth-quake laid the city flat.
His defeat of the best player in the town soon led him to great fame.
sentences.chinese: 他打敗全城最佳選手之後名聲大振。

sentences.english: Another approach under consideration is to raise the city's buildings.
sentences.chinese: 還有一個方案是加高威尼斯全城建築的高度。

sentences.english: A view of the Canape-Vert area of Port-au-Prince shows hundreds of homes destroyed by the earthquake.
sentences.chinese: 俯瞰太子港，我們可以看到全城現在已經是一篇廢墟。

sentences.english: The whole town is blacked out.

definition: Mancheng county in Baoding 保定[Bao3 ding4], Hebei
Nancheng county in Fuzhou 撫州|抚州, Jiangxi
top of streets, bottom of alleys (idiom); everywhere in the city
great streets and small alleys (idiom); everywhere in the city
Xincheng or Hsincheng township in Hualien County 花蓮縣|花莲县[Hua1 lian2 Xian4], east Taiwan
Shancheng district of Hebi city 鶴壁市|鹤壁市[He4 bi4 shi4], Henan
Shuicheng county in Liupanshui 六盤水|六盘水[Liu4 pan2 shui3], Guizhou
Dacheng county in Langfang 廊坊[Lang2 fang2], Hebei/Tacheng township in Changhua county 彰化縣|彰化县[Zhang1 hua4 xian4], Taiwan
the multitudes come out from everywhere, emptying every alleyway (to celebrate)/the whole town turns out
